column4: Hey, I went to download the latest ubuntu, and was wondering why 64-bit is not recommended for regular usage?
primary benefits of 64 bit apply if you have >4 gig of ram
I am aware if this, but what are the drawbacks which make them say it's not recommended?
i THINK there are more 32 bit apps than 64.  also not all 32 have been packaged for 64?
